email_sequence.subject: Allstate Floral, Inc. - Still using paper at trade shows?
email_sequence.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I noticed Allstate Floral, Inc. has a major presence at High Point Market. With the show in -494 days, how are your reps planning to handle orders when they can't access your systems?

Last year, several exhibitors lost over $50K each during WiFi outages.

How do you currently handle order processing at trade shows?

Best,
{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: How Butler Specialty solved this
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Quick follow-up - Butler Specialty had the same challenge at High Point. Their President told me: 'eCat flexibly configures to the way we do business'

They now process orders completely offline. Zero downtime.

Worth a quick call?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: 30% order error rate industry average
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Did you know the furniture industry averages a 30% order error rate with manual processes?

At your scale, that could mean $400K+ in lost margin annually.

Here's a 2-minute video showing how eCat eliminates these errors: [link]

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: ROI calculator for Allstate Floral, Inc.
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

I ran some numbers for Allstate Floral, Inc.:

- Time saved: 3 hours/day per rep
- Error reduction: 25%
- Trade show revenue protection: $150K+

Total first-year ROI: 412%

Want to see the full breakdown?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Godinger Silver case study
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Joel Stern, VP IT at Godinger Silver, called eCat 'Best thing in 25 years, reps are in love'

They saw:
- 67% reduction in order processing time
- Zero trade show downtime
- 40% increase in rep productivity

Here's their full story: [link]

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Last chance before -494 days to show
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

With High Point Market approaching fast, you're running out of time to get a solution in place.

Implementation takes just 2 weeks. Your reps could be fully trained before the show.

Can we schedule 15 minutes this week?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Should I close your file?
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

I've reached out several times about solving Allstate Floral, Inc.'s order processing challenges.

If this isn't a priority, I'll close your file and stop following up.

But if you're still losing money on manual processes, just reply 'interested' and I'll send over some times to connect.

{{sender_name}}

linkedin_sequence.message: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed Allstate Floral, Inc.'s presence at High Point Market. Managing orders without reliable WiFi must be challenging. Would love to share how similar companies handle this.
{{first_name}}, thanks for connecting! Curious - what's your biggest challenge with sales operations right now?

optimization_notes: Moderate pain - focus on education and ROI demonstration
Focus on rep productivity and sales process efficiency
